This level also includes a guest bedroom with en suite shower room, a cloakroom, and a well-equipped utility room. <PARA> Occupying the entire first floor, the luxurious principal suite offers a tranquil retreat, comprising a spacious bedroom, a bespoke dressing room with ample custom-built storage, and a lavish en suite bathroom. The upper floors also accommodate three further well-proportioned bedrooms, two bathrooms (one en suite), and two additional cloakrooms. <PARA> Thoughtfully designed with an abundance of storage and finished in elegant neutral tones, this exceptional home offers timeless style in a prestigious location. <PARA> Brunswick Gardens is conveniently located close to Notting Hill Gate with its many shops, cafes and restaurants.
